entry.title: UniFi Access Point 6.5.40
entry.summary:
Overview This release includes changes from prior release candidate builds, a full changelog will be available at general release. This release has prioritized roaming performance for Gen2/Gen3/Gen6 APs, as well as improved topology reporting for Gen6 IW APs. Improvements
[Gen2/Gen3/Gen6] Improved neighbor report accuracy. [U6-IW/U6-Enterprise-IW] Improved topology reporting for wired clients.
Bugfixes
Fixed neighbor reports occasionally not being populated when APs are configured with a static IP. Fixed wireless downlinks configured to broadcast on DFS channels disconnecting every night at 2AM local time. Fixed an issue with guest client authorization after disabling and reenabling the guest hotspot landing page. [Gen2/Gen3] Fixed neighbor reports not updating on other APs when Gen2/Gen3 APs change channels because of a DFS radar hit.
Additional information
Refer to the Help Center article here to determine the UniFi Access Point generation. Update your devices by changing the Device Firmware Release Channel in the UniFi Network application to Release Candidate. If you wish to go back to the Official release after the upgrade, change the release channel back to Official.
If you encounter any issues with this release, please provide us with some details on your setup and include the below information:
AP model(s) Previous AP release version UniFi Network application version

entry.title: UniFi LTE 6.2.55
entry.summary:
Improvements
Improved automatic APN detection. Prevent SNMP service listening on the LTE interface.
Additional information
Update your devices by changing the Device Firmware Release Channel in the UniFi Network application to Release Candidate. If you wish to go back to the Official release after the upgrade, change the release channel back to Official.
If you encounter any issues with this release, please provide us some details on your setup and include the below information:
U-LTE model(s) Previous LTE release version UniFi Network application version

entry.title: UniFi Access Point 6.5.37
entry.summary:
Overview UniFi Access Point 6.5.37 provides better roaming for Gen2/Gen3/Gen6 APs. In this release, we have added improvements to Neighbor Report functionality for Gen2/Gen3/Gen6 APs. This new method significantly improves performance and reliability, including roaming between bands.
Your feedback about roaming performance specifically is appreciated as we continue work on these improvements for other AP generations. For additional changes for these and other generations, see the release post for UniFi Access Point 6.5.33.
This release is currently a Release Candidate. Improvements
Improved stability of wireless uplinks. [Gen2/Gen3/Gen6] Improve client connection and wireless uplink stability. [Gen2/Gen3/Gen6] Improved neighbor report reliability to reflect neighboring AP channel chan…
